subject: Questions about VAM Pro
description_text:
Hi,

I would like to purchase 3 VAM Pro. I have 3 sims and would like to out fit the brake pedals. Do I need to order 3 separate motors with a power supply? Or can I order the 3 in a set? I can't find if the 3 set has separate power supplies, other that it's powered by one. Also would like to know how it's connected to the PC. Do I also need to buy the control box?

Best regards,
Niels

conversations.body_text: Hi Niels Boer,  Do you have our SIMSONN pedals? Which model is it?

Hi,

No I don't. I use hydraulic pedals from a real car.

Met vriendelijke groet,
Niels Boer



-------- Oorspronkelijk bericht --------

Hi Niels Boer,   You’ll need a PlusX control box + a separate 24V power supply + 3 VAM Pro modules. This setup can work with SIMSONN Manager telemetry or SimHub.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053435194     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498

Hi,

It will be installed on 3 different sims, so if I'm right I need to order,

3x Plus X Pedal control box
3x Power supply
3x VAM Pro

Met vriendelijke groet,
Niels Boer



-------- Oorspronkelijk bericht --------
Hi Niels Boer,  Yes, that’s correct. We apologize for the delayed response.
